entry.title: New CSS Viewport Units Do Not Solve The Classic Scrollbar Problem
entry.summary: Since the introduction of CSS viewport units in 2012, many of us have been using `width: 100vw` as a way to set an element’s width to the full width of the viewport. entry.title: Preparing For Interaction To Next Paint, A New Web Core Vital
entry.summary: Starting in March 2024, Interaction to Next Paint will formally replace First Input Delay as a Core Web Vital metric.
